song_lyrics: Nathī narne nidhi sukhnī, tap vinyā trilokane māy re;
Prabhune prasanna karavā nathī, evo bījo upāy re... Nathī° ṭek
Nārāyaṇnī nābhithī nīsarī, tap ādaryu Brahmāy re;
Teṇe karīne tanmā pāmyā, sāmrathi sadāy re... Nathī° 1
Rhuṣhabhdev Bharat bhomīe, je je tyāgī ke’vāy re;
Te te rīzyā tapmā temā, doṣh kem devāy re... Nathī° 2
Dev dānav muni mānavī, je koya jagmā gaṇāy re;
Te to pāmyā tapthī moṭī, padavī sadāy re... Nathī° 3
Sarve siddhāntnu siddhānt chhe vāt, pādharī jo prīchhāy re;
Niṣhkuḷānand e narne nakkī, karavu e chhe nyāy re... Nathī° 4
title: Nathī narne nidhi sukhnī

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-465: Sadguru Nishkulanand Swami

Category: Updeshna Pad
